name: TT Teds (iOS10-12)
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
Only compatible on iOS10-12. Separate packages for iOS13 and iOS14 are available.

Installed to: /Library/Themes/[fontname].theme/

Apply with theming engines e.g. SnowBoard. Package name = Fonts.

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet

1.1: Added support for 3rd party apps (Spotify, Twitter, Discord, YouTube)
